title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 81-2.4 - Information report for subsidiaries
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 81-2.4 - Information report for subsidiaries

State Regulations

Every parent corporation that has acquired one or more subsidiaries shall on or before May 1st of each year file with the superintendent an information report on form IR (see Appendix 22, infra) for each subsidiary owned directly or indirectly. Such information report shall correspond to the subsidiary's fiscal year. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
§§
81-2.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
